target_markets.market_description: Aspiring entrepreneurs and individuals seeking to build wealth from minimal starting capital
demographics: current employees looking to quit jobs
pain_points: lack of knowledge about wealth-building opportunities
target_markets.market_size_indicators: 1 out of 9 Americans is a millionaire - significant addressable market of 8 out of 9 who aren't

problems_validated.problem: People don't know high-return opportunities exist (private equity, investment banking, business ownership)
problems_validated.severity: Critical - prevents people from even pursuing wealth-building paths
problems_validated.current_solutions: Traditional employment, low-return activities like warehouse work
problems_validated.market_gap: Lack of exposure to knowledge about high-return opportunities, especially for those without wealthy parents

products_tools.name: acquisition.com
products_tools.metrics: portfolio generates over $250 million per year, three companies worth over $100 million each

business_strategies.strategy: Skill stacking - learning complementary skills that make each other more valuable
business_strategies.implementation: Start with sales (1-to-1), then marketing (1-to-many), then acquisition (complete customer acquisition)
business_strategies.expected_results: Each skill makes previous skills retroactively more valuable, exponential improvement
business_strategies.case_study: Alex Hormozi's progression from gym consulting to $250M+ portfolio

business_strategies.implementation: Eliminate distractions, surround yourself with higher earners, change physical location if needed
business_strategies.expected_results: Increased motivation and reduced friction toward goals
business_strategies.case_study: Moving to California to learn from successful gym owner

problems_solutions.problem: Lack of motivation to pursue wealth building
problems_solutions.solution: Create deprivation by surrounding yourself with people who make significantly more money

problems_solutions.problem: Learning low-return skills instead of high-return skills
problems_solutions.solution: Focus on sales, marketing, and acquisition skills rather than operational tasks
steps: Practice eye contact and voice projection
problems_solutions.time_estimate: same effort as learning warehouse skills but higher returns

startup_ideas.validation: Learning from existing successful gym owner first

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Pursuing stable employment over entrepreneurship when you hate your job
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Staying trapped in low-return, unfulfilling work
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Develop high agency and self-belief that overrides others' opinions
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Everyone except one person thought quitting the Baltimore job was a bad idea

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Treating confidence and charisma as fixed traits rather than learnable skills
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Believing you can't develop these capabilities
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Break down traits into component skills and practice each one
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Sales broken down into active listening, eye contact, voice projection, etc.

growth_tactics.tactic: Educational content sharing knowledge that wealthy people have but others don't
steps: Identify knowledge gaps in target audience
Share insider knowledge about wealth-building opportunities

metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Calculate liquid assets minus house value
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on building investable assets rather than just income

trends_signals.opportunity: Large market of people who could achieve millionaire status with proper knowledge and skills

actionable_quotes.quote: you are the foundation of everything that you want to have
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining why personal development comes first in wealth building
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus on developing yourself before external strategies

actionable_quotes.quote: the more you learn the better you get the better you get the more you get
actionable_quotes.context: Describing how skills compound and make each other more valuable
actionable_quotes.actionability: Prioritize learning complementary skills that stack together

actionable_quotes.quote: your belief about yourself has to be more important than what other people say about you
actionable_quotes.context: Overcoming social pressure when pursuing entrepreneurship
actionable_quotes.actionability: Develop high agency and self-belief to override negative opinions

key_statistics.statistic: 1 out of 9 Americans is a millionaire
key_statistics.context: Demonstrating that millionaire status is achievable and not extremely rare

key_statistics.statistic: Every business started since 2016 has gone to over $10 million per year
key_statistics.context: Alex Hormozi's track record to establish credibility

key_statistics.statistic: Portfolio generates over $250 million per year
